channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- IntelliJ IDEA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- IntelliJ IDEA

item.title: CVE-2022-47896|2024-08-03T15:02:36.552Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.3.1 code Templates were vulnerable to SSTI attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-46827|2024-08-03T14:39:38.709Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.3 an XXE attack leading to SSRF via requests to custom plugin repositories was possible.

item.title: CVE-2022-46825|2024-08-03T14:39:39.061Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.3 the built-in web server leaked information about open projects.

item.title: CVE-2022-29813|2024-08-03T06:33:42.799Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 local code execution via custom Pandoc path was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-47895|2024-08-03T15:02:36.436Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.3.1 the "Validate JSP File" action used the HTTP protocol to download required JAR files.

item.title: CVE-2022-46826|2024-08-03T14:39:38.606Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.3 the built-in web server allowed an arbitrary file to be read by exploiting a path traversal vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-29818|2024-08-03T06:33:42.652Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 origin checks in the internal web server were flawed

item.title: CVE-2022-40978|2024-08-03T12:28:42.951Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: The installer of JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.2.2 was vulnerable to EXE search order hijacking

item.title: CVE-2022-46824|2024-08-03T14:39:38.595Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.2.4 a buffer overflow in the fsnotifier daemon on macOS was possible.

item.title: CVE-2022-29817|2024-08-03T06:33:42.813Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 reflected XSS via error messages in internal web server was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-37010|2024-08-03T10:21:32.474Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.2 email address validation in the "Git User Name Is Not Defined" dialog was missed

item.title: CVE-2022-28651|2024-08-03T05:56:16.316Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2021.3.3 it was possible to get passwords from protected fields

item.title: CVE-2022-29819|2024-08-03T06:33:42.822Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 local code execution via links in Quick Documentation was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-29815|2024-08-03T06:33:42.657Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 local code execution via workspace settings was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-48432|2024-08-03T15:10:59.805Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2023.1 the bundled version of Chromium wasn't sandboxed.

item.title: CVE-2022-46828|2024-08-03T14:39:39.181Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.3 a DYLIB injection on macOS was possible.

item.title: CVE-2022-29814|2024-08-03T06:33:42.902Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 local code execution via HTML descriptions in custom JSON schemas was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-37009|2024-08-03T10:21:32.463Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.2 local code execution via a Vagrant executable was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-29812|2024-08-03T06:33:42.664Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 notification mechanisms about using Unicode directionality formatting characters were insufficient

item.title: CVE-2022-29816|2024-08-03T06:33:42.690Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2022.1 HTML injection into IDE messages was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-48430|2024-08-03T15:10:59.810Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2023.1 file content could be disclosed via an external stylesheet path in Markdown preview.

item.title: CVE-2022-48433|2024-08-03T15:10:59.821Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2023.1 the NTLM hash could leak through an API method used in the IntelliJ IDEA built-in web server.

item.title: CVE-2022-48431|2024-08-03T15:10:59.796Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2023.1 in some cases, Gradle and Maven projects could be imported without the “Trust Project” confirmation.

item.title: CVE-2024-24941|2024-07-05T17:21:31.653Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2023.3.3 a plugin for JetBrains Space was able to send an authentication token to an inappropriate URL

item.title: CVE-2024-24940|2024-02-06T09:21:30.488Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2023.3.3 path traversal was possible when unpacking archives

item.title: CVE-2024-24941|2024-02-06T09:21:30.981Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2023.3.3 a plugin for JetBrains Space was able to send an authentication token to an inappropriate URL
